title: Parasite City
description: Caleb Drago, once a commander of an anti-terrorist unit, is reunited with his former pupil Deva and her Special Forces team. Mission: to capture Hoax, a notorious cyber terrorist who's hiding in the zombie-infested Quarantine Zone Five. But what starts out as a straightforward task quickly turns into a sinister game of survival... and the rules keep changing.
author: Slav Georgiev
